attributes.action: Free travel for children/teenagers all over the Uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My petition is for all children/teenager up to the age of 19 in full time education, to be able to travel anywhere within the UK free of charge.

Proof must be shown they are in full time education.

It will stop children getting fined so it will save parents money.

It could improve attendance in schools.

Make children more active as it will be easier to get to locations. (Helping in the fight against obesity)

Encourage children to stay on in further education. (More skilled labour + better work force)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
